content:

### Notes
- Material breaches at 4. AutoParts Direct in serious stress. Default rate at 1.6%. Revolver draw rate hit 50%. 9 PIK elections. Borrowers sub-1.5x ICR now 24 vs 12 at month start. Base rate transmission to borrower stress accelerated.
